import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Loader from "../layout/loader"; import Taptop from "../layout/tap-top"; import Header from '../layout/header' import Sidebar from '../layout/sidebar' import Footer from '../layout/footer' import ThemeCustomize from "../layout/theme-customizer"; import Layout from "./AppWrapper" import {ToastContainer} from 'react-toastify'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, Redirect} from "react-router-dom"; import Dashboard from "../components/dashboard/dashboard" import Login from "../components/new/Login" import Members from "../components/new/MembersTable" import Saccos from "../components/new/SaccoTable" import MembersRegistration from "../components/new/Formik/SaccoMemberRegistration" import SaccoRegistration from "../components/new/Formik/SaccoRegistration" const App = () => { return (
{children}
); } export default App;
